other_tests.findings: In mild distress, appears uncomfortable; Tender to palpation over right lower quadrant with rebound tenderness and guarding; Dark stools not grossly bloody but guaiac positive.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Diffuse mucosal hyperemia of the colon with mild thickening of the colonic wall; prominent reactive mesenteric lymph nodes measuring up to 1.0 cm; abnormal appendix with mucosal hyperemia and mural thickening; overall findings concerning for possible ulcerative colitis flare.
